message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you get 10.  We can negotiate from here if you think it's unfair.
Alice, your initial offer was quite low. Let's be more realistic. I propose I take $70, and you get $30. We both know the longer this goes on, the less we both get.
I'm willing to be more flexible, but $30 is too low for me. I propose $60 for me, $40 for you. Let's get this done before the value of our money drops any further!
Alice, it seems like we both want a larger share. I'm proposing $60 for me and $40 for you.  Let's settle this now and avoid losing more to inflation.
